description: This quiet, move-in ready corner unit 3 bdrm, 2.5 bath townhouse at “Fleetwood Gables” offers 1,768 sq ft of bright, well-designed living space. Enjoy a bright, sunny, south-facing, fully fenced private backyard, perfect for relaxing, entertaining, or enjoying morning coffee. The main flr features formal living & dining areas, a large kitchen and an adjoining flex space ideal for a family rm or home office. Nearly every room is filled with abundant natural light. Upstairs, the spacious primary bdrm boasts a deluxe 5 pc ensuite, while the main bath offers a large walk-in shower. Additional highlights include generously sized bdrms and a dbl garage plus driveway parking. Pet-friendly strata in a highly walkable neighbourhood close to shopping, schools and parks.
